author: Jade Scipioni
title: Crime scene cleaner CEO: This is the biggest mistake people make when it comes to coronavirus cleaning
description: Hazardous-cleanup CEO Erick McCallum has seen it all when comes to dangerous cleanup jobs. He says there is a simple way people can avoid cross-contamination in their homes, plus tips on how to clean.
content:
No cleaning job is ever to dangerous or dirty for Texas-based hazardous-cleanup company CG Environmental (aka the "Cleaning Guys").
Since 1992, the company has cleaned up everything from crime scenes to chemicals spills and radioactive waste to dirty flood w… [+3099 chars]
